posts.name: Shakira
posts.message: I have the ability and intelligence to learn anything I want, as I have the discipline and patience to train and study

posts.name: Gracianne
posts.message: I can live on what I love to do

posts.name: Carlos
posts.message: Tudo o que vier que venha para o bem. Eu vou evoluir, amadurecer e aprender.

posts.name: Jos√©
posts.message: If I fail, great, because I'll keep trying. I will have more strength to try again.

posts.name: Amanda
posts.message: I love having company, but I also feel good alone.

posts.name: Samantha
posts.message: I can do things correctly and I do things completely, without leaving things halfway.

posts.name: Shakira
posts.message: It doesn't matter what you decided. What matters is that it makes you happy.

posts.name: Shakira
posts.message: If I can't do everything, I do everything I can.
